content.question: Based on the diagram above, which of the following describes what will happen in the long-run adjustment process?

choices.label: The natural rate of unemployment will increase.
Potential real <math alttext="G D P " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></math> will increase.
Wages and input prices will increase.

content.answer: Wages and input prices will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
